name: I am Setsuna
description: Inspired by the timeless classic Chrono Trigger, I am Setsuna is a great homage to the JRPG masterpieces of yesteryear. Journey with Setsuna as she prepares to make the ultimate sacrifice and save the people of her land.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8/8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Core i3 2GHz and above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS250 / Radeon HD5750 or better
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8/8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 2.2GHz and above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX460 / Radeon HD6850 or better
